page.title: 16HUNSINGORE SCHOOL
page.content: The children have swimming lessons once a week in summer at{Wetherby {Pool.}They do{P.E.}at the sports field or in the class room.They have music lessons with Mrs. Hainsworth,she teaches them to play the recorder.Some children play guitar.A visiting teacher comes to school once a week to teach them. Other children go to an other school for woodwind lessons.They play clarinet or flute.This year two boys passed their Grade two guitar exam.and one girl passed her clarinet Grade three exam.When they are nearly 10 they can do their cycling profiency test.Mr Askew,Chief Road Safety Officer,comes to school to instruct them.The school joins with others for some activities during the year. Sports,concerts,and drama are some of the events we share.The Head Teacher is Mrs.Jones.
